Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.ui.gui.JFXControllers

GUI's JavaFX controllers.
  • Interface Summary
    Interface Description
    GameGUIControllerInterface
    Interface for all the main controllers used during the actual game
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    AbstractGUIController
    Abstract class of JavaFX controllers
    BoardGUIController
    Handles the personal board screen
    DevelopmentGUIController
    Handles the development market screen
    EndGUIController
    Handles the GUI end screen
    GameCreationGUIController
    Handles the game creation screen
    GameMenuGUIController
    Handles the menu that can be opened during the game
    GameTemplate
    Contains all the tabs that get displayed at the left of the screen during the game
    LeaderSelectionGUIController
    Handles the game setup screen
    LeaderShowGUIController
    Handles the leader cards screen
    LobbyGUIController
    Handles the game lobby screen
    MainMenuGUIController
    Handles all the screens that come before the the game creation or the lobby
    MarketGUIController
    Handles the resource market screen
    MarketTemplate
    Handles the interactive part of the market
    OtherBoardGUIController
    Handles the board of other players
    SelectedProductions
    Handles all the current production states
    WarningGUIController
    Handles the screen when a player exits the game during setup or when someone saves the game
  • Enum Summary
    Enum Description
    ScreenName
    Contains every game screen with its corresponding FXML file name and the used CSS stylesheets
